content: I am trying to build wasmtime on a Raspberry Pi which has an ARMv7 (32 bit) processor. Unfortunately, this architecture is not (yet) supported by wasmtime. I was wondering, since the x86.rs module seems to support both 32 bit and 64 bit architectures, wouldn't it be possible to do the same for ARM? Or how hard can it be to support ARMv7?
Sorry I just found the discussion in the cranelift stream. Closing this here.
Mats Brorsson has marked this topic as resolved.
